headline: One sent to hospital after crash in Youngstown
author: Desirae Gostlin
sentences: According to police, two cars were involved in an accident on Route 422 near Old McCartney Road on the city’s East Side before 6 p.m.
YOUNGSTOWN, Ohio (WKBN) – A crash in Youngstown sent one person to the hospital Thursday evening.
The condition of the person in the hospital is unknown at this time.
